    • Method Detail

      • isForwardMotion

        public boolean isForwardMotion(int newRank)

      • validMotion

        public boolean validMotion(char newFile,
                           int newRank,
                           Board board)
        Asserts that the new space is 2 spaces up/down (if it is the Pawn's first move) or only 1 space up/down. In the case that the Pawn is capturing another piece, this function allows for moving diagonally 1 space.
        Parameters:
        newFile - file coordinate of new position
        newRank - rank coordinate of new position
        board - Current state of the chess board
        Returns:
        true if the motion fits the Pawns's behavior

        Parameters:
